item.title: Running a .command file on mac
item.dc:creator: @HiddeNAttacK HiddeNAttacK
item.description:
@HiddeNAttacK wrote:

swapped ac.jar and bot around still getting same msg on terminal

Last login: Wed Jul 25 09:31:24 on ttys000
/Users/******/Desktop/******'s_Bot/Run_RAHBot.command ; exit;

/Users/******/Desktop/******‘s_Bot/Run_RAHBot.command: line 3: unexpected EOF while looking for matching `"’
/Users/******/Desktop/******t’s_Bot/Run_RAHBot.command: line 4: syntax error: unexpected end of file

Anyone good with java and terminal on here who could help me out on teamview to getting a .command file running.

item.title: Running a .command file on mac
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

Shouldn’t the jar file be the first thing in your classpath then?

item.title: Running a .command file on mac
item.dc:creator: @HiddeNAttacK HiddeNAttacK
item.description:
@HiddeNAttacK wrote:

Does anyone know whats wrong with this .command file

#!/bin/bash
ABSPATH=$(dirname $0)
java -cp :$ABSPATH/bot":"$ABSPATH/AC.jar":"$ABSPATH" bot.Client -mp “$ABSPATH”

trying to run AC.jar file

Read full topic
